physical_appearance: "The image shows a painting. It is rectangular in shape. The foreground of the painting shows a body of water. Boats can be seen on the body of water. The background shows the skyline of a series of buildings by the body of water. The buildings in the centre of the painting have spires of different lengths and the one of the buildings to the left has a triangular roof. The location, signature and year, ""Choon Ngee. 1960
creator_1: Tan, Choon Ghee, 1930- Tan, Choon Ghee
subject_terms_2: is stated at the bottom right hand side. " rivers Buildings Boats and boating Rotterdam (Netherlands) Cultural landscapes
